howItWorksSubtitle: Register free and activate your account with a valid email in seconds.
how.steps.register.title: Register Online
how.steps.register.desc: Join our research community with lifetime free membership. Create your account in a few quick steps and verify your email.
how.steps.profiler.title: Profiler Survey
how.steps.profiler.desc: Complete your profile survey as soon as you login. This helps us match you with the most relevant surveys and rewards.
how.steps.daily.title: Daily Surveys
how.steps.daily.desc: After finishing your profiling, receive a wide range of daily surveys tailored to your interests and demographics.
how.steps.grow.title: How You Grow
how.steps.grow.desc: The more you participate, the higher your rank and the better your survey eligibility, rewards, and bonuses.
